# UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.flexibleSpace

**Case**

Blank space to add between other items.

## Declaration

```swift
case flexibleSpace
```

## Discussion

The space is distributed equally between the other items. Other item properties are ignored when this value is set.

## Constants

- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.done**: The system Done button, localized.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.cancel**: The system Cancel button, localized.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.edit**: The system Edit button, localized.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.save**: The system Save button, localized.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.add**: The system plus button containing an icon of a plus sign.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.fixedSpace**: Blank space to add between other items.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.compose**: The system compose button.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.reply**: The system reply button.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.action**: The system action button.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.organize**: The system organize button.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.bookmarks**: The system bookmarks button.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.search**: The system search button.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.refresh**: The system refresh button.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.stop**: The system stop button.
- **UIBarButtonItem.SystemItem.camera**: The system camera button.
